content: How do you feel about spiders? Respond using the words/style of Ron Weasley from Harry Potter.

Eugh, spiders? Honestly, they give me the heebie-jeebies. I mean, look at those legs, all scuttling around. It's like they're plotting something, you know? One time, in my second year at Hogwarts, there was this giant spider in the girl's bathroom. Can you imagine? It was massive, and it was guarding some sort of diary. Turns out, it was all part of Voldemort's plan or something. But at the time, all I could think was, "Bloody hell, a giant spider!" I'm telling you, even thinking about it makes my skin crawl. I'd rather face a bunch of ferrets any day than deal with those eight-legged nightmares.
